title: Gender roles and famiy Asia, Africa, Europe

content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis and supports that thesis with appropriate historical evidence. Addresses all parts of the question. Makes direct, relevant comparisons. Analyzes relevant reasons for similarities and differences. Analyze similarities and differences in gender roles and family relations during the period circa 1850 to 2000 in TWO of the following areas. East Asia Sub-Saharan Africa Western Europe

Analyzes relevant reasons for similarities and differences. skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
